<p-calendar
  [(ngModel)]="value"
  [showIcon]="showIcon"
  [monthNavigator]="monthNavigator"
  [yearNavigator]="yearNavigator"
  yearRange="{{yearRange}}"
  [showTime]="showTime"
  [timeOnly]="timeOnly"
  dateFormat="{{dateFormat}}"
  (onSelect)="change(value)"
  [disabled]="isDisabled"
  showButtonBar="true"
  [minDate]="minDate"
  [maxDate]="maxDate"
>
</p-calendar>

styles: .row{margin-top:15px}.mutil-img .group-item .singleImg,.signle-img{border:1px solid grey;padding:3px;box-shadow:0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.23)}.mutil-img,.signle-img{display:inline-block}.mutil-img .group-item{display:inline-block;position:relative;margin-right:5px;margin-bottom:30px}.mutil-img .group-item span{position:absolute;left:50%;bottom:-25px;margin-left:-25px;cursor:pointer}.mutil-img .group-item span:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:grey}.add-icon{margin-left:30px;margin-bottom:25px;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block}img{cursor:pointer}body{position:relative}.mask-wrapper{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;z-index:99999}.close{position:absolute;top:50px;color:#fff;right:100px;cursor:pointer}.remove.icon{color:#000;position:absolute;margin-left:3px;margin-top:10px;padding:20px}.remove.icon:before{content:'';position:absolute;left:2px;width:30px;height:5px;background-color:#fff;-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);transform:rotate(45deg)}.remove.icon:after{content:'';position:absolute;width:30px;left:2px;height:5px;background-color:#fff;-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);transform:rotate(-45deg)}.loader-img{border:3px solid #f3f3f3;border-radius:50%;border-top:3px solid #3498db;width:36px;height:36px;-webkit-animation:2s linear infinite spin;animation:2s linear infinite spin}@-webkit-keyframes spin{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0)}100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes spin{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0);transform:rotate(0)}100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}.plus.icon{color:#000;position:relative;width:65px;height:65px;border:3px solid #000;border-radius:50%;cursor:pointer}.plus.icon:before{content:'';position:absolute;width:30px;height:3px;background-color:#000;top:50%;left:50%;margin-left:-15px}.plus.icon:after{content:'';position:absolute;width:30px;height:3px;background-color:#000;-webkit-transform:rotate(90deg);transform:rotate(90deg);top:48%;left:24%}.form-wrapper{display:flex;align-items:center}.form-wrapper .signle-img{width:100px;min-height:100px;display:flex;align-items:center}.form-wrapper .signle-img img{width:100%}.form-wrapper .mutil-img{display:flex;margin-bottom:33px;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center}.form-wrapper .mutil-img img{width:100px}.error-message{color:red;margin-top:15px}.btn-upload-file{position:relative}.btn-upload-file .add-icon{position:absolute;right:-50px;top:0}.fa-times{margin-left:15px;cursor:pointer;color:#cd5c5c}

styles: :host ::ng-deep .headline{text-align:center;background:linear-gradient(to top,#ff5370,#ff595a);font-size:110%;color:#fff;padding:.8em 0}:host ::ng-deep .pageComponents{display:inline-flex;overflow:hidden;height:100%;position:fixed;width:100%;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around}:host ::ng-deep .noteListContainer{position:relative;margin:1em 0;padding:1em 0;flex-basis:30%;text-align:left;order:1;flex-shrink:1}:host ::ng-deep .note-list-header{font-size:20px;text-align:center;padding:1.5em 1em;margin:.75em;color:#585656;position:-webkit-sticky;position:sticky;top:0;align-items:center}:host ::ng-deep .note-list{position:relative;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;height:68vh;margin:.5em 0 .5em .5em}:host ::ng-deep .note-list-item{padding:1.1em;font-size:13px;letter-spacing:.5px;border-bottom:1px solid #f5efef;min-height:24px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-end;color:#484545}:host ::ng-deep .note-list-item:hover{background:#fbf1f1}:host ::ng-deep .aboveEditor{font-size:1.25em;text-align:left}:host ::ng-deep input[type=text].noteTitle{font-size:14.5px;line-height:20px;height:20px;letter-spacing:.7px;font-family:'Open Sans';border-bottom:2px solid #f6f7fb;border-top:none;border-left:none;border-right:none;width:80%;position:inline;padding:.5em;margin-left:.6em}:host ::ng-deep .tool-bar{border:2px solid #f6f7fb;text-align:center;font-family:'IBM Plex Sans',sans-serif;background-color:#dedcdc;margin:.5em .5em 0;padding:.5em;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,.1)}:host ::ng-deep .editors{border:none;border-radius:4px;padding:1em 1.5em 3em;margin:-.2em .6em 1em;font-family:Helvetica;line-height:1.4;color:#2c3a51;text-align:left;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,.1);min-height:36%;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto;position:relative;height:40vh;font-size:90%}:host ::ng-deep .editors a{color:#00f}:host ::ng-deep a{color:#00f}:host ::ng-deep a:visited{color:#00f}:host ::ng-deep img{min-width:100px;max-width:300px;text-align:center}:host ::ng-deep button#new{padding:.25em;border-radius:100px;width:2em}:host ::ng-deep button.submitNote{border-radius:10px;font-size:13px;float:right;display:inline;padding:.5em;color:#fff;border:none;background-color:#ff5370;margin:.35em}:host ::ng-deep .code-block,div.code-block{color:#90caf9;line-height:1.2;padding:3px;margin-left:4px;background-color:#000;font-family:'Andale Mono';font-size:13px;box-sizing:border-box;white-space:pre-wrap;display:block}#link_url,.RichEditor-styleButton,:host ::ng-deep .styleButton{padding:6px 12px;background:#fff;border:none;color:#ff595a;margin:.35em;max-width:35px;min-width:30px;font-family:'IBM Plex Sans',sans-serif;font-size:13px;height:2.25em}:host ::ng-deep .RichEditor-activeButton{background-color:#feb47b;color:#fff}:host ::ng-deep select{padding:.5em;background:#fff;border:none;color:#ff595a;margin:.35em;border-radius:6px;font-family:'IBM Plex Sans',sans-serif;font-size:13px;height:2.25em}#italic,#underline,:host ::ng-deep #bold{width:30px}:host ::ng-deep #code{font-family:'Andale Mono',monospace;padding-left:3px!important;padding-right:3px!important}:host ::ng-deep .styleButton#bold{font-weight:800}:host ::ng-deep .styleButton#italic{font-style:italic;font-family:'IBM Plex Sans',sans-serif}:host ::ng-deep .styleButton#underline{text-decoration:underline}:host ::ng-deep .material-icons{font-size:13px}
